A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I finally saw a star wars movie I actually liked. I was pretty comfortable with nearly everything and I thought that the director along with the crew did a fantastic job. I studied art and read some books (unrelated to star wars)\, and I was honestly in the right mindset to watch this movie. I really enjoyed it because my family and I had a good time watching this film. It's a movie about family and philosophy and it might or might not stand the test of time\, but I approve of the films message. thanks guys.
